word:
There is a large amount of work to be done in other lines where you can accomplish good if you are in living connection with God. The churches need the labor you can give them. You can do a precious work in teaching the truth. You can present your ideas of Bible truth in such a manner that others are able to grasp them.--Letter 25a, 1892, pp. 1, 2. (To G. C. Tenney, Editor of the Bible Echo, December 23, 1892.) 

Released March 26, 1974.
